data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huo, Lizhi, Wang, Xingmin, Chen, Xiaosheng, Ren, Shunxiang (2013): The genus Aspidimerus Mulsant, 1850 (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae) from China, with descriptions of two new species. ZooKeys 348: 47-75, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.348.5746, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.348.5746
